I am a developer

Hello! My name is Radmir Uzyanbaev, I'm 16 years old, and I live in Russia. Currently, I'm in the 10th grade and have a passion for computers. I have experience in building computers, configuring Windows, and an interest in programming. Currently, I am studying Frontend development and Python. I have already completed several projects using HTML/CSS/JS and implemented several Telegram bots using Python.
